snippet: ABC has announced the short-term fates of its remaining freshman comedies, with “The Goldbergs” and “Trophy Wife” both receiving full-season orders.
abstract: ABC announces short-term fates of its remaining freshman comedies, with The Goldbergs and Trophy Wife both receiving full-season orders.
lead_paragraph: ABC has announced the short-term fates of its remaining freshman comedies, with “The Goldbergs” and “Trophy Wife” both receiving full-season orders.

headline.print_headline: ABC Extends the Lives Of Some New Sitcoms
headline.main: ABC Extends the Lives of Some New Sitcoms
